title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N.R.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: N. R.; upper right: 935
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram comprised of letter "N" formed by two curved elements joined by a diagonal black line whose lower section forms the diagonal of letter "R"; a green circle forms curved element of "R."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N.R.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black, green ink, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-99.
